segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing and creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is wet, but she doesn't seem to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on drying that plate, nothing else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sorry for her, she's missing everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like the stool is about to tip over, but he doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel a bit melancholy.
segments.speaker: PAR
